title: riot plz make ap item with QSS
body: Why is Mercurial Scimitar the only item that builds with quicksilver sash? I feel like having QSS on a very low mobility ap champ would be extremely useful like on xerath, anivia, kat, karthus and tf(others obv just naming off a few)

replies.body: {{summoner:1}} could technically take that, i mean i'm an xerath main and sometimes snag that if there team is cc heavy.

That would simply replace Zhonya's in most matchups.  Though I suppose it could be fair now that it doesn't remove Zed's ult, and I don't know how it interacts with Fizz's ult anymore.  Could someone tell me that actually?
You're not a fucking tank if you get hit as an AP champ you deserve to get punished.
